name: 马克斯·普朗克
bio_short: 德国理论物理学家，量子力学的创始人。他因在1900年提出“量子假说”（E=hf）以解决黑体辐射问题而获得了1918年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
bio_short_en: A German theoretical physicist who originated quantum theory. He won the 1918 Nobel Prize in Physics for his 'quantum hypothesis' (E=hf), which he proposed in 1900 to solve the black-body radiation problem.
